channel.title: Little help please
channel.description: Excuse me I made a server and i'm trying to learn a little about coding i've been studying tuts/editing basic sources. But I can't seem to find a way to make it so that the commands that people do actually go to the commandlogs in my logs folder. Anyone a little help or can you redirect me to a place where I can learn how?

item.title: Little help please
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Stop posting bad responses and read his post correctly -.- he wants a command log everytime you type a command ::
Anyways you would probably need to edit packet 103 for this

Read full topic

item.title: Little help please
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

what do you mean by commandlogs?

all you need to do is find a command that you have in your client.java

and under the last }

and a new command o.O

Read full topic
